评论详情: I got the jumpsuit for my aunt’s 70th bday celebration. I purchased it at the last minute because my original purchase from a different company still has not arrived. I’m 5’6 and weigh 177. Purchased a large and the length was perfect. Will add additional colors to my wardrobe.

This jumpsuit looked pretty silly when I pulled it out of the bag. But when I tried it on, I actually liked it. It fit my shape well and was comfortable. But where's the belt? It looks like pajamas or an entirely incomplete without a belt. Every picture for every color shows a matching tie belt and mine did not come with one. I tried matching it with several other belts I ordered off amazon and could not find one this dark (I ordered the navy blue), nor could I find anything in the store that made this attractive. I noticed some other reviewers stated theirs did not come with a belt either while other reviewers pictures show a matching belt. So which is it?  Includes a tie belt or not? I just couldn't come up with anything that made this look like a fashionable outfit in the time I had left for an upcoming wedding and am returning it.

I bought this for my very modest 13 year old who doesn't like to wear dresses. She absolutely loved the pinkish purple and the size small (her normal size) fit her perfectly. She wore it to a dance and received a lot of compliments. Very stretchy, comfortable, thinner but not sheer. We pinned the v-neck for modesty.

评论概述: If you want green (sparkle) do not buy
评论详情: Bought for a costume specifically needed green... the actual color is (I looked this up) London Blue Topaz. I asked several people in different lighting... definitely not even remotely green.  I would return, but I've already tried 5 types of paints, glitter sprays and dyes to try to make it green. I wanted this to work so badly, but ultimately had to buy from a different vendor.  The garment itself isn't bad except for the color, and the top was hard to get up over my shoulders. Otherwise it stretches A LOT. I'm a big girl, American 16/18, had room to spare and was shocked by that. Not sheer or see through (guessing if the fabric stretched tighter it might be).
